intro: Haworthia decipiens var. cyanea, commonly known as the blue haworthia, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It features compact, rosette-shaped leaves that are typically blue-gray in color, with white to light blue markings. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow or orange during the growing season. It thrives in well-draining soil and requires minimal water, making it suitable for indoor cultivation. Due to its unique appearance and low maintenance, it is a popular choice among succulent enthusiasts.
